action.action-desc: Mr. Gimenez introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security

form.official-title: To exempt commercial truck drivers from Canada or Mexico who are seeking to temporarily enter the United States for business through a land port of entry from any COVID–19 vaccination requirement.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Terminating Reckless and Unnecessary Checks Known to Erode Regular Shipping Act or the TRUCKERS Act.

Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the Secretary of Homeland Security may not impose any COVID–19 vaccination requirement on any commercial truck driver who is a national of Canada or of Mexico and is seeking to temporarily enter the United States for business through a land port of entry.
